member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextManager.Interop.DROPDOWNENTRYTYPE2
member.summary: Specifies the drawing protocol requested for a combo. Used in calls.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextManager.Interop.DROPDOWNENTRYTYPE2.ENTRY_UNINDENT_COLLAPSED
member.summary: Determines whether the indentation should be applied to the selected item in the combo box.

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextManager.Interop.IVsCompletionSet3
member.summary: Provides statement completion capabilities for the language service.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextManager.Interop.IVsCompletionSet3.GetContextIcon(System.Int32,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Get the image index of the context icon for the given item. If == -1, no icon is displayed.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextManager.Interop.IVsCompletionSet3.GetContextImageList(System.IntPtr@)
member.summary: Gets the list of context images supported by this completion set.

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextManager.Interop.IVsDropdownBar2
member.summary: Provides control of the drop-down bar at the top of a code window.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextManager.Interop.IVsDropdownBar2.GetComboEnabled(System.Int32,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Gets the current enabled status of a dropdown bar.
member.param: [out] true if the dropdown bar is enabled, otherwise false.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextManager.Interop.IVsDropdownBar2.SetComboEnabled(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Enables or disables a dropdown bar.
member.param: The index of the combo box.

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextManager.Interop.IVsDropdownBarClient3
member.summary: Describes the contents of the dropdown bar combinations.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextManager.Interop.IVsDropdownBarClient3.GetAutomationProperties(System.Int32,System.String@,System.String@)
member.summary: Gets the automation name and ID for the drop down box.
member.param: [out] The automation name of the combo.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextManager.Interop.IVsDropdownBarClient3.GetComboWidth(System.Int32,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Gets the width of the column by percent. If all the columns return 0, the default width is used. The value should be between 0 and 100.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextManager.Interop.IVsDropdownBarClient3.GetEntryImage(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32@,System.IntPtr@)
member.summary: The successor to the method. This method also returns the image list. If this method returns a non-zero result, the dropdown bar calls instead.
member.param: The index of the combo box.
[out] The pointer to the image list.
